manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, photorealistic baseball bat leaning against the fence behind the players, casting a soft shadow on the grass.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the baseball glove from the player on the left, ensuring no residual shadow remains on his hand.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the grassy background with a vibrant, photorealistic sunset over a desert landscape, matching the existing lighting.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rainfall with visible raindrops and puddles on the ground, creating appropriate reflections and darkening the scene.
manipulations.duplication_scale: Duplicate the player on the right and scale him down to half the original size, placing him in front of the original player.
